results.title: Effects of metformin on human gingival fibroblasts: an in vitro study
results.text_hl: Future in vivo and clinical studies evaluating this link may aid in understanding the long-term efficacy of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MF@@@ for @<m>DISEASE_Periodontal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010510 @@@periodontal diseases@@@ management and dose response impacts of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@MF@@@.

results.title: Locally delivered 1% metformin gel improves periodontal parameters: A systematic review and meta-analysis.
results.text_hl: The study aimed to systematically assess available literature that evaluate the effectiveness of 1% @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ gel in the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Periodontal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010510 @@@periodontal disease@@@.

results.title: The anti-periodontitis action of metformin via targeting NLRP3 inflammasome.
results.text_hl: CONCLUSIONS: Our study provided novel insights into the anti-@DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammatory@@@ effects of @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ against @GENE_DFNA34 @GENE_114548 @@@NLRP3@@@ inflammasome activity, which could potentially be used for the prevention and treatment of @SPECIES_837 @@@P. gingivalis@@@-related @<m>DISEASE_Periodontal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010510 @@@periodontal diseases@@@.

results.title: [Effect of the management of class I obesity with metformin on metalloproteinase activity in patients with chronic periodontitis].
results.text_hl: Conclusions: treatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ in @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with @DISEASE_Obesity @DISEASE_MESH:D009765 @@@obesity@@@ class I and @<m>DISEASE_Periodontal_Diseases</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D010510 @@@periodontal disease@@@ decreases BMI, improves the symptoms of @DISEASE_Chronic_Periodontitis @DISEASE_MESH:D055113 @@@chronic periodontitis@@@ and decreases the activity of metalloproteinases 1, 3, 8, V present in periodontium of these @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@.
